title: How to Create the Matrix Rain in Command Prompt

Click "File" and then "Save As."
steps.description: Save your file as a Batch file: "Matrix.bat".

steps.headline: Run the batch file as administrator.
To enlarge screen right click on the command prompt.
On the window size section, enter the resolution of your monitor.
Type CTRL-C and type "y" to terminate the program.
